short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tools for testing multi-touch functions with PenMount touch controllers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tool provides the following functionality:
(1) Testing multi-touch line drawing
(2) Display information about the connected PenMount touch device.
